name: demandpoints
title: Demand Points Preparation
description: A component that prepares demand points (customers, delivery addresses, clinics...) data for Location Allocation.

inputs.name: dpoints_table
inputs.title: Demand Points
inputs.description: The source table containing demand points data.
inputs.helper: The source table containing demand points data.

inputs.name: dpoints_id
inputs.title: ID column
inputs.description: The column containing the unique identifier for each demand point.
inputs.helper: The column containing the unique identifier for each demand point.

inputs.name: dpoints_geom
inputs.title: Geometry column
inputs.description: The column containing each demand point location.
inputs.helper: The column containing each demand point location.

inputs.name: demand_bool
inputs.title: Use demand
inputs.description: Whether each demand point should have an associated demand value.
inputs.helper: Whether each demand point should have an associated demand value.

inputs.name: demand_col
inputs.title: Demand column
inputs.description: The column containing demand values for each demand point.
inputs.helper: The column containing demand values for each demand point.

outputs.name: output_table
outputs.title: Output table
outputs.description: The table with the prepared demand points data.
outputs.helper: The table with the prepared demand points data.
